attributes.action: Abolish the speed limit on motorways. For those drivers who undertak high speed driver training.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The motorway speed limit was introduced in the 1960's, and has not been adjusted since. This doesn't reflect the vast improvements in car construction in the last 40 years. 

With high speed driver training we believe that there should be no reason why drivers of modern cars shouldn’t be allowed to drive in excess of the 70MPH speed limit.
